text:
No person may file pursuant to this Chapter an appeal of the following matters: 
     (a)     A decision concerning the same issue or issues at the same property that was finally decided by the Commission within the previous twelve (12) months; and 
     (b)     A decision made by the Commission when it was sitting as the Abatement Appeals Board.
(Added by Ord. 160-99, File No. 990798, App. 6/11/99)
